Highsmith calendar

Highsmith is a simple calendar picker. It has several customization options, and does not require jQuery or any additional CSS. Simply attach Highsmith to an input/element. When you select a date on the calendar, its value will be placed into your input/element. View the code on Github

An example of a basic, unstyled Highsmith calendar.

// html
<input type="text" id="default-cal"/>

// Invoke Highsmith on your element.
var defaultCal = new Highsmith('default-cal');

Customize Highsmith with options.

// html
<input type="text" id="custom-cal"/>

// Options
var options = {
  resetDateButton: true, // Let the user reset the date.
  killButton: true, // Let the user kill the calendar.
  style: {
    globals: {
      // Give the entire calendar a custom font.
      fontFamily: 'Helvetica, sans-serif',
    }
  }
};

// Invoke Highsmith.
var customCal = new Highsmith('custom-cal', options);
